# cogs

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

cogs is an [R](https://www.r-project.org/) package used to store functions /
data / scripts that are useful for maintaining and developing the
[reconverse](https://www.reconverse.org).

## Installation

You can install cogs from from GitHub repository with

```{r eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("reconverse/cogs")
```
